name: Up Chuck
description:
Up Chuck is a hack and slash roguelike, where you play as Kit, a creature wearing a fox-like mask and wielding a peculiar pair of gun-chucks. Your home has been consumed by something wicked, and it's up to you to unearth and defeat the source of this corruption. Use your razor-sharp reflexes and blaze your way to the top of the Spirit Sanctum, collecting precious perks along the way.

Foxfire Games: Carissa, Ephram, Rieley, Thomas

Go to findurmom.com for a web build.

Assets:

Red Doors V2.0 by Matthew Pablo
